about.title: About Me
about.p1: I'm Avin — a full-stack web developer with 5+ years of experience, primarily at BIGAZINES building CMS platforms, e-commerce sites, enterprise websites, and internal systems.
about.p2: What I do best is "deliver independently": from requirements gathering, wireframing, coding, deployment, to ongoing maintenance — I handle the full cycle. I also enjoy working with colleagues — programmers are stronger together. Even with unfamiliar frameworks or undocumented legacy projects, I ramp up fast and deliver working features within 2–4 weeks.
about.p3: I'm particularly strong at leveraging AI tools to rapidly deliver prototypes and production-ready systems — using LLMs for code generation, content creation, automated testing, and workflow automation. This approach lets me ship MVPs in days instead of weeks, and has significantly improved both development speed and quality.
about.p4: Beyond coding, I frequently take on PM duties: coordinating with colleagues and clients, managing timelines, handling risks, and ensuring deliverables actually move the business forward.
about.p5: I love turning complex requirements into clean, usable systems — and there's nothing quite like seeing clients actually use something I built.

experience.title: Experience
bullets: Independently developed, deployed, and maintained 20+ websites/systems across different frameworks (.NET C#, PHP, Node.js, Python, etc.)
Rapidly learned and delivered complete features with zero prior knowledge or documentation
Served as PM: communicated with clients, designers, and operations teams to define scope, track progress, handle changes, and ensure business alignment
Managed cloud deployments (AWS, Azure, Hostinger, Cloudways) maintaining high availability and security
Leveraged AI tools to rapidly prototype and deliver production systems — code generation, content assistance, test automation — saving the team significant time on repetitive work

about.title: 關於我
about.p1: 我是 Avin，一位有超過 5 年全端網頁開發經驗的開發者，主力在 BIGAZINES 做各種 CMS、電商、企業網站跟內部系統。
about.p2: 我最擅長的是「獨立完成」：從跟客戶 / 團隊從傾需求、flow design、寫 code、部署上線，到後續維護，全流程自己搞掂。當然也擅長和喜歡與同事合作。Programmer 一起 強大 不用多言
about.p3: 特別擅長運用 AI 工具快速交付 Prototype 與正式系統——用 LLM 輔助寫 code、生成內容、自動化測試跟 workflow，可以幾日內出 MVP，開發速度跟品質都大幅提升。
about.p4: 除了技術，我也常當PM 角色：協調同事、客戶，排進度，確保交付的 Project 真的幫到手。
about.p5: 喜歡把複雜需求變成簡單好用的系統，也享受看到客戶樂於使用我做的東西。

在沒知識基礎的情況下，快速學習並交付完整功能
擔任 PM 角色，與客戶、設計、營運團隊溝通需求、定義範圍、追蹤進度、處理變更，確保專案符合業務目標

擅長運用 AI 工具快速交付 Prototype 與正式系統——程式碼生成、內容輔助、測試自動化，節省團隊大量重複工作時間
